name: Roll'n'Run
description:
Roll'n'Run

Inspired from classical Jump'n'Run games and Super Mario, Roll'n'Run offers a unique new perspective on those classics, because it is the first time the main character gets hurt.

Martin, the main character, who is sitting in a wheel chair after an accident, is still focused and motivated to reach his goal: Peach. In Roll'n'Run the player helps Martin to reach his goal by building and simplifying the way via ramps and other elements. 

This game was developed by students of the Technical University Graz as part of the lecture Game Design and Development 2017/18.

Credits

  • Andreas Bruchmann
  • Darío Herraiz
  • Jannik Hildebrandt
  • Marcel Lohfeyer
  • Sandra Brettschuh
